pages.text: Press [w] to Ponder. $(br2)This is the pipe that allows specific extraction if there are multiple fluids in a basin. For example, trying to extract chocolate while there is milk in the basin still left over from the process.

$(li)Running multiple Mechanical Pumps adjacent together and connected together as shown previously in the Ponder scene for Mechanical Pumps significantly increases the fluid throughput. $(li)High RPM also works.
